```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tutorial.helpers)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
NHL_data <- read_csv("NHL_shots_2010_2018_regseason.csv")
NHL_data_plot <- NHL_data |> summarize(playerDraftYear, goals)
```

```{r}
NHL_data_plot |> ggplot(aes(x = playerDraftYear, y = goals)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.05) + 
  scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Year Drafted", y = "Goals Scored", subtitle = "Graph is more concentrated on the right as this is between the 2010 - 2018 seasons and many had passed their prime or retired", title = "Goals in Between the 2010 and 2018 Seasons Based off Year Drafted")
```
